description: Set of VCLs required to integrate Netacea services. Please note for full functionality Fastly support needs to enable proper handling of POST requests. Additionally, an edge dictionary named netacea_edge_config must be created. Use of this dictionary is optional and requires advanced configuration. A Netacea Engineer can assist you with this setup. Do not enable this module unless the prerequisite steps have been completed.
name: Netacea Bot Detection integration

properties.description: Integration Mode. Must be one of BYPASS, INGEST, INJECT, MITIGATE.
properties.label: Integration Mode
properties.name: netacea_integration_mode

properties.description: Salt value used to generate signature hash for Netacea cookies
properties.label: Netacea Secret
properties.name: netacea_secret

properties.description: Key used to encrypt/decrypt Netacea cookies
properties.label: Encryption key
properties.name: netacea_encryption_key

properties.description: Cookie name for Netacea to track user. Defaults to _mitata
properties.label: Netacea cookie name
properties.name: netacea_cookie_name

properties.description: Cookie name for Netacea to save captcha result. Defaults to _mitatacaptcha
properties.label: Netacea captcha cookie name
properties.name: netacea_captcha_cookie_name

properties.description: Up to 5 comma separated URL directory paths that API Protector will ignore. Please start URL paths with a forward slash. Example: /test, /allowed/, /path/to/something
properties.label: Netacea ignore list - URL Paths
properties.name: netacea_ignore_list

properties.description: Name of the header containing client's real IP. Leave empty to use connecting IP.
properties.label: Real IP Header Name
properties.name: netacea_real_ip_header_name

properties.description: Set to "true" if you wish to load captcha page assets from the same domain as your website.
properties.label: Use Relative Captcha Page Assets
properties.name: netacea_use_relative_path_captcha_assets

properties.description: Relative path to fetch captcha HTML stored in Netacea for mobile apps. Start with slash "/"
properties.label: Captcha URL path
properties.name: netacea_captcha_path

properties.description: Name and value for a response header added to captcha page. Should follow a format of "name={{header name}}&value={{header value}}". This header is to help apps to determine captcha from other response types without inspecting contents.
properties.label: Captcha page marker header
properties.name: netacea_captcha_header

properties.description: When enabled, the integration will return a JSON object in place of a captcha page if a request Accept header indicates that text/html is not accepted, but application/json is.
properties.label: Enable Captcha Content Negotiation
properties.name: netacea_enable_ccn
